titleStmt.title: Life in death, or The living hope of a dying saint, handled in a sermon preached at the funeral of that eminently vertuous, and religious gentle-woman, Mris. Mary Morley, late wife to Colonel Harbert Morley, Esq; and daughter to Sr. John Trevor Knight. By Zachary Smith, minister of the Gospel, and pastor of the church at Glynde in Sussex, Sept. 18. 1656.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Zachary, b. 1604 or 5.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by W. Bentley for Andrew Crook, at the sign of the green Dragon, in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
